CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Metro Center?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Metro Center is arc {South Gate}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Metro Center?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Metro Center is arc {Skyline Station}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Skyline Station} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Metro Center} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from West Cross to Skyline Station in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from West Cross to South Gate in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Metro Center to Skyline Station in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between West Cross and Skyline Station in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between West Cross and Skyline Station is {73}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Metro Center and Skyline Station in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Metro Center and Skyline Station is {190}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Skyline Station?
SC.A: The total flow output from Skyline Station is {549}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Skyline Station?
SC.A: The total flow input by Skyline Station is {336}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 156? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {353} from {Skyline Station} to {Metro Center}, a flow of {190} from {Metro Center} to {Skyline Station}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 38? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {37} from {South Gate} to {West Cross}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 54 and 66? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {59} from {West Cross} to {Skyline Station}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Metro Center to South Gate or from Metro Center to Skyline Station?
NC.A: The flow from {Metro Center} to {Skyline Station} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Metro Center to South Gate, from South Gate to Metro Center, or from Skyline Station to West Cross?
NC.A: The flow from {Skyline Station} to {West Cross} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Skyline Station}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Metro Center} and {Skyline Station}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Metro Center, Arc Skyline Station, Arc South Gate, Arc West Cross}.
